channel.title: Twitter @Google AI
channel.description: Google AI is focused on bringing the benefits of AI to everyone. In conducting and applying our research, we advance the state-of-the-art in many domains. - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

item.title: Today on the blog, learn about the importance of combining user experience (UX) design and responsible AI in product development, and how Google’s Re...
item.description: Today on the blog, learn about the importance of combining user experience (UX) design and responsible AI in product development, and how Google’s Responsible AI UX team’s cross-functional collaborations have led to responsible development across Google. https://goo.gle/3NUnC7T
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Congrats to Googler @milindtambe_ai for winning the AAAI Award for Artificial Intelligence for the Benefit of Humanity, which recognizes the positive ...
item.description: Congrats to Googler @milindtambe_ai for winning the AAAI Award for Artificial Intelligence for the Benefit of Humanity, which recognizes the positive impacts of AI to protect, enhance, & improve human life in meaningful ways with long-lived effects. More ↓https://goo.gle/3RTiuSU
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Areas with fewer trees are more vulnerable to climate change. Google Research launched Tree Canopy Insights on Google's Environmental Insights Explore...
item.description: Areas with fewer trees are more vulnerable to climate change. Google Research launched Tree Canopy Insights on Google's Environmental Insights Explorer (EIE) to help fight extreme heat — learn how it’s being used in Austin, TX to tackle climate inequity → https://goo.gle/3S3F5xk
item.author: Google AI

item.title: For millions of people, being able to speak & be understood can be difficult. Learn how Adwoa & George are using Project Relate, a beta Android applic...
item.description: For millions of people, being able to speak & be understood can be difficult. Learn how Adwoa & George are using Project Relate, a beta Android application, to help overcome communication obstacles and use their voices for change. Watch their full story → https://goo.gle/49VxmID
item.author: Google AI

item.title: 2023 has been an exciting year for research across Google. Today @JeffDean, @demishassabis, and James Manyika highlight some of this year's exciting r...
item.description: 2023 has been an exciting year for research across Google. Today @JeffDean, @demishassabis, and James Manyika highlight some of this year's exciting research across #GenerativeAI, language models, quantum, health, #ResponsibleAI, and more! Check it out at https://goo.gle/3TBsyCp
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Magic Eraser now uses gen AI to fill in detail when users remove unwanted objects from photos. Google Research worked on the MaskGIT generative image ...
item.description: Magic Eraser now uses gen AI to fill in detail when users remove unwanted objects from photos. Google Research worked on the MaskGIT generative image transformer for inpainting, and improved segmentation to include shadows and objects attached to people.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Our researchers helped develop Hold for Me, an AI-driven technology that processes audio directly on your Pixel device and can determine whether you'v...
item.description: Our researchers helped develop Hold for Me, an AI-driven technology that processes audio directly on your Pixel device and can determine whether you've been placed on hold or if someone has picked up the call. Learn more → https://goo.gle/49VKv4n
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Today, hear from Tania Bedrax-Weiss, Sr. Director, Research Engineering at Google! She and her team explore how to push the state of the art in langua...
item.description: Today, hear from Tania Bedrax-Weiss, Sr. Director, Research Engineering at Google! She and her team explore how to push the state of the art in language & vision understanding and generation; their goal is to make Google products more efficient, reliable, and easy to use. More ↓
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Check out our researchers’ contributions to Ultra HDR, a format allowing Pixel devices to capture more lifelike images. It provides tonemapping into ...
item.description: Check out our researchers’ contributions to Ultra HDR, a format allowing Pixel devices to capture more lifelike images. It provides tonemapping into a wider range of colors & brightness/contrast, enabled by the Actua & Super Actua HDR-enabled displays on the Pixel & Pixel 8 Pro.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: The HausaNLP Research Group in Nigeria uses Google Colab to build next-generation datasets for Hausa & other low-resource languages. Their goal is to ...
item.description: The HausaNLP Research Group in Nigeria uses Google Colab to build next-generation datasets for Hausa & other low-resource languages. Their goal is to increase the representation of the 300+ languages spoken in Nigeria in AI training datasets. Watch more →https://goo.gle/3NArT09
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Introducing VideoPoet, a large language model for zero-shot video generation that produces a range of large & smooth motions while preserving objects...
item.description: Introducing VideoPoet, a large language model for zero-shot video generation that produces a range of large & smooth motions while preserving objects’ appearance over multiple seconds. Learn more and check out a range of example generated videos → https://goo.gle/4atanoj
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Post-event traffic congestion around stadiums is a problem worldwide. Today, in partnership with the Seattle Dept. of Transportation, we demonstrate a...
item.description: Post-event traffic congestion around stadiums is a problem worldwide. Today, in partnership with the Seattle Dept. of Transportation, we demonstrate a potential simulation-based plan calibrated for the specific dynamics of the area for better traffic flow. https://goo.gle/3v7AEZv
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Join Ret. Admiral William McRaven & Google’s SVP of Research, Technology & Society, James Manyika, as they discuss the future of AI, its potential to...
item.description: Join Ret. Admiral William McRaven & Google’s SVP of Research, Technology & Society, James Manyika, as they discuss the future of AI, its potential to benefit society, & the crucial role of leadership in its responsible development. Watch the full video → https://goo.gle/3RqDKiD
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Congrats to Di Wang & coauthors for co-winning the SODA 2024 Best Paper Award for "Deterministic Near-Linear Time Minimum Cut in Weighted Graphs", whi...
item.description: Congrats to Di Wang & coauthors for co-winning the SODA 2024 Best Paper Award for "Deterministic Near-Linear Time Minimum Cut in Weighted Graphs", which is a significant development since Karger's famous randomized algorithm for this problem. Learn more→ https://goo.gle/48mXpqr
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Responsible AI is artificial intelligence built using a human-centered design approach. Learn how Google Research approaches Responsible AI, including...
item.description: Responsible AI is artificial intelligence built using a human-centered design approach. Learn how Google Research approaches Responsible AI, including how it’s built, tested, and how to release AI products responsibly. Watch the full video → https://goo.gle/3tpDDvy
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Read all about recent advances in using ML to improve efficiency of ML workloads — including TpuGraphs, a performance prediction dataset on large ten...
item.description: Read all about recent advances in using ML to improve efficiency of ML workloads — including TpuGraphs, a performance prediction dataset on large tensor computational graphs, and Graph Segment Training, a novel method to scale graph neural networks →https://goo.gle/3RrnQUZ
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Google Research helped develop Magic Editor, an AI-powered photo editor that allows users to easily make complex edits to photos using generative AI. ...
item.description: Google Research helped develop Magic Editor, an AI-powered photo editor that allows users to easily make complex edits to photos using generative AI. We fine-tuned models for inpainting, image transformation, super-resolution, and more. Learn more → https://goo.gle/3t4lcfU
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Introducing StyleDrop, a model that allows a significantly higher level of stylized text-to-image synthesis by using a few style reference images that...
item.description: Introducing StyleDrop, a model that allows a significantly higher level of stylized text-to-image synthesis by using a few style reference images that describe the style for text-to-image generation, bypassing the burden of text prompt engineering. More→ https://goo.gle/3v0PsZw
item.author: Google AI

item.title: RT Google Public Policy: In Dialogues, @Google's James Manyika, @Kent_Walker, @demishassabis, and experts from a variety of backgrounds explore some o...
item.description:
RT Google Public Policy
In Dialogues, @Google's James Manyika, @Kent_Walker, @demishassabis, and experts from a variety of backgrounds explore some of the biggest unanswered questions about AI, society, and what comes next.

Explore the digital magazine here. https://www.theatlantic.com/sponsored/google-2023/dialogues/3841/
item.author: Google AI
